CreateIdentityPool.name: CreateIdentityPool
CreateIdentityPool.description: Grants permission to create a new identity pool

DeleteIdentities.name: DeleteIdentities
DeleteIdentities.description:
Grants permission to delete identities from an identity pool. You can specify a list
                                                of 1-60 identities that you want to delete

DeleteIdentityPool.name: DeleteIdentityPool
DeleteIdentityPool.description:
Grants permission to delete a user pool. Once a pool is deleted, users will not be
                                                able to authenticate with the pool

DescribeIdentity.name: DescribeIdentity
DescribeIdentity.description:
Grants permission to return metadata related to the given identity, including when
                                                the identity was created and any associated linked logins

DescribeIdentityPool.name: DescribeIdentityPool
DescribeIdentityPool.description:
Grants permission to get details about a particular identity pool, including the pool
                                                name, ID description, creation date, and current number of users

GetCredentialsForIdentity.name: GetCredentialsForIdentity
GetCredentialsForIdentity.description: Grants permission to return credentials for the provided identity ID

GetId.name: GetId
GetId.description:
Grants permission to generate (or retrieve) a Cognito ID. Supplying multiple logins
                                                will create an implicit linked account

GetIdentityPoolRoles.name: GetIdentityPoolRoles
GetIdentityPoolRoles.description: Grants permission to get the roles for an identity pool

GetOpenIdToken.name: GetOpenIdToken
GetOpenIdToken.description: Grants permission to get an OpenID token, using a known Cognito ID

GetOpenIdTokenForDeveloperIdentity.name: GetOpenIdTokenForDeveloperIdentity
GetOpenIdTokenForDeveloperIdentity.description:
Grants permission to register (or retrieve) a Cognito IdentityId and an OpenID Connect
                                                token for a user authenticated by your backend authentication process

GetPrincipalTagAttributeMap.name: GetPrincipalTagAttributeMap
GetPrincipalTagAttributeMap.description: Grants permission to get the principal tags for an identity pool and provider

ListIdentities.name: ListIdentities
ListIdentities.description: Grants permission to list the identities in an identity pool

ListIdentityPools.name: ListIdentityPools
ListIdentityPools.description: Grants permission to list all of the Cognito identity pools registered for your account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description:
Grants permission to list the tags that are assigned to an Amazon Cognito identity
                                                pool

LookupDeveloperIdentity.name: LookupDeveloperIdentity
LookupDeveloperIdentity.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the IdentityId associated with a DeveloperUserIdentifier
                                                or the list of DeveloperUserIdentifiers associated with an IdentityId for an existing
                                                identity

MergeDeveloperIdentities.name: MergeDeveloperIdentities
MergeDeveloperIdentities.description:
Grants permission to merge two users having different IdentityIds, existing in the
                                                same identity pool, and identified by the same developer provider

SetIdentityPoolRoles.name: SetIdentityPoolRoles
SetIdentityPoolRoles.description:
Grants permission to set the roles for an identity pool. These roles are used when
                                                making calls to GetCredentialsForIdentity action

SetPrincipalTagAttributeMap.name: SetPrincipalTagAttributeMap
SetPrincipalTagAttributeMap.description:
Grants permission to set the principal tags for an identity pool and provider. These
                                                tags are used when making calls to GetOpenIdToken action

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to assign a set of tags to an Amazon Cognito identity pool

UnlinkDeveloperIdentity.name: UnlinkDeveloperIdentity
UnlinkDeveloperIdentity.description: Grants permission to unlink a DeveloperUserIdentifier from an existing identity

UnlinkIdentity.name: UnlinkIdentity
UnlinkIdentity.description: Grants permission to unlink a federated identity from an existing account

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from an Amazon Cognito identity pool

UpdateIdentityPool.name: UpdateIdentityPool
UpdateIdentityPool.description: Grants permission to update an identity pool
